Message.En: Battle for Gritten Fort: Uphill Battle
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦　戦況：苦戦

Message.En:
For new recruits, it will be a heavy burden of
large-scale combat.
The enemy will come at us with increasing
ferocity, but showing no openings in their
movements.
Relying solely on intuition and individual skills
will provide little chance of victory.
Do not overlook the enemy's weak points, but
connect your attacks strategically.
Message.Jp:
新兵には荷の重い大規模戦闘となる
敵は狂暴性を増しながらも隙のない動きを見せてくる
勘やセンスに頼った個人技を振りまわすだけでは
勝機は薄いだろう
連係をつなぎ敵の弱点を見逃すな

Message.En:
Escort Leo and defeat the enemy at the target
locations
Message.Jp: レオを護衛し、目標地点の敵を殲滅せよ

Message.En:
An Ambush Unit has appeared, offering a chance
for a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊が出現、戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered and receive
a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Lured out the main force of the ambush unit. A
chance for War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊の本隊を誘い出した。戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered and receive
a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Defeat the battalion commander and complete the
defense.
Message.Jp: 大隊長を撃破し、防衛を完遂せよ

Message.En:
Battle for Gritten Fort: Uphill Battle (Result
Reward)
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦：苦戦《リザルト報酬》
